<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Likha (The Teller)](/Deities.aspx?ID=192)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 315, [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 132 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

The Teller has existed ever since the first sound of existence emanated from the focal point of the cosmos, blessing all of creation with the capacity for perception. She uttered the concept of language, she sang in echo with all that would be, and in hubris that would color all her sorrows, she thought to make that which emanated truth. In doing so, she birthed deception.

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Vudrani Gods
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=17)

**Edicts** Tell history to others, sponsor or perform in plays and recitals, adapt ancient works into modern language

**Anathema** Begin a performance or tale without first inviting the gods to watch, act out a death on stage

**Area of Concern**
history, sound, truth

**Follower Alignments**
LN, NG, N, CN

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Deities/Likha.png" />
</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Intelligence or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12)

**Favored Weapon** [Hatchet](/Weapons.aspx?ID=27)

**Domains** [Creation](/Domains.aspx?ID=5), [Knowledge](/Domains.aspx?ID=17), [Passion](/Domains.aspx?ID=25), [Sorrow](/Domains.aspx?ID=50)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Repose](/Domains.aspx?ID=49), [Truth](/Domains.aspx?ID=32)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Illusory Disguise](/Spells.aspx?ID=159)

- **3rd**
[Enthrall](/Spells.aspx?ID=104)

- **5th**
[Illusory Scene](/Spells.aspx?ID=161)

</column>
